Pre-Game Insights: The Utah Jazz have lost seven of their last nine games overall.
The Phoenix Suns have lost eight of their last 11 games overall.
The Jazz have lost 20 of their last 21 road games against Pacific Division opponents.
The Suns have lost four of their last five games as home favorites.
The Jazz haven't been able to get anything going this season, but they were more than competitive in their narrow loss to the Heat in their last outing.
The Suns haven't been much better than the Jazz to be fair, but the Suns are just about at full health and they would've taken plenty of confidence from their win over the Hawks on Thursday.
